title: Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 4
description:
Historical Controversies and Revisionism - Collection 4:

We have 21 titles here:

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 1 (2001)

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 2 (2001)

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 3 (2002)

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 4 (2002)

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 5 (2002)

-  Benson (Ed.) - History Behind the Headlines; the Origins of Conflicts Worldwide, Vol. 6 (2003)

-  Black & MacRaild - Studying History, 2e (2000)

-  Fischer - Historians' Fallacies; Toward a Logic of Historical Thought (1970)

-  Flexner & Flexner - The Pessimist's Guide to History; an Irresistible Compendium of Catastrophes, Barbarities, Massacres, and Mayhem (2008)

-  Grafton - What Was History; the Art of History in Early Modern Europe (2007)

-  Halsall - Worlds of Arthur; Facts & Fictions of the Dark Ages (2013)

-  Heddesheimer - The First Holocaust; Jewish Fund Raising Campaigns with Holocaust Claims During and After WWI (2003)

-  Hoover - Freedom Betrayed; Herbert Hoover's Secret History of the Second World War and Its Aftermath (2011)

-  Hughes-Warrington (Ed.) - Palgrave Advances in World Histories (2005)

-  Jenkins - Why History; Ethics and Postmodernity (1999)

-  Keegan - The Battle for History; Re-Fighting World War II (1995)

-  Milne - The Revenge of History; the Battle for the 21st Century (2012)

-  Popper - The Poverty of Historicism (2002)

-  Rhatigan - Bizarre History; Strange Happenings, Stupid Misconceptions, Distorted Facts and Uncommon Events (2011)

-  Russell - A Renegade History of the United States (2010)

-  Topping - Utah Historians and the Reconstruction of Western History (2003)
